Notes.Text:
This update for wireshark fixes the following issues:

- Updated to Wireshark 3.6.20:

  - CVE-2024-0208: Fixed a crash in the GVCP dissector (bsc#1218504).
  - CVE-2024-0209: Fixed a crash in the IEEE 1609.2 dissector (bsc#1218505).
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use
